entry.title: Saturday: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
